BACKUPS.COPYIEDCLIPBOARD: Backup has been copied to clipboard.
BACKUPS.SURETEXT: Are you sure to restore a backup? Existing content will be overwritten! Exisiting Backups still remains.
BACKUPS.WARNINGHEADER: Are you sure to restore a backup? Existing content will be overwritten! Existing Backups still remains.
CHAT.DESC1: Create a private chat room with the APP and invite a chat partner.
CHAT.DESC2: The platform of your chat partner does not matter.
CHAT.DESC3: Please specify your language and that of your chat partner. Open the chat room and share it.
CHAT.DESC4: Just enter a nickname and enter the chat:
CHATROOM.NEEDAPPTEXT: To use the language input, you must have the aiTranslate Android app installed.
HISTORY.TEXTHASCOPY: Text has been copied to clipboard.
HOME.CHANGELANGTEXT: Change source language to something else then 'auto'
HOME.COPIEDCLIPBOARD: Translated text has been copied to clipboard.
HOME.ENTERHERE: Enter text here or use speech input
HOME.LANGINSTALLEDTEXT: Are you sure you have the selected text-to-speech language installed? On newer systems the download should start automatically, on older please check your Android tts system settings to install the missing language.
HOME.NOTE: Note: The translator expands its full potential with complete sentences.
HOME.TEXTEMPTYTEXT: Are you sure to translate your clipboard? Text will we overwritten!
LANGCHOOSER.TITLE: Select your language:
NOTES.HASCOPIED: Note has been copied to clipboard.
OPTIONS.NOTICETTS: NOTICE: Deactivated by default, because android standard text-to-speech is used for this. Results could be poor, but perhaps a handy tool in some cases.
OPTIONS.WARNINGTEXT: Are you sure you want to change the language? App will be restarted.
TICKET.ANYPROBS: Any problems? Please let me know:
TICKET.WRONG: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
WEB.WEB1: Direct access to your smartphone translation data over WiFi to your computer.
WEB.WEB2: Both devices have to be in the same WiFi network.
WEB.WEB4: Not recommended in public WiFi networks!
WIZARD.3: Use your task manager to switch to the DeepLapp Translator
WIZARD.4: Select languages and hit translate clipboard
WIZARD.7: Use the refresh and language button to cleanup for the answer
WIZARD.8: Write your answer, translate it and use the share button
WIZARD.9: Choose your Whatsapp contact or app
